skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I have experience in each of the following technologies: html & css & javascript & React js & tailwindcss & scss & material UI.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I have experience in each of the following technologies: php & node js & express js & mysql & nosql mongodb

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: I have experience in designing interfaces using each of the following techniques: Figma & Adobe Xd & Adobe Photoshop

portfolio.title: Mosul city news website
portfolio.description: Mosul City News is a web app built with React JS, offering local news and info to Mosul residents. It features: Local & international news News categories & search Sharing & commenting User-friendly design Responsive across devices Stay informed, connect with your community, and support Mosul's economy through local news

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.description: A site that contains some of student Zaid’s works, such as the good photos he takes, and it shows his experience and field. The site contains two themes: dark theme and light theme. The site is responsive to all devices and contains a field for contacting the person and social media identifiers.

portfolio.title: Palestine will remain free
portfolio.description: Palestine Will Remain Free is a news website that defends the Palestinian cause and works to spread awareness about the injustice befalling the Palestinian people The site targets an Arab and international audience who is interested in the Palestinian issue and wants to know more about the current events in Palestine

portfolio.title: mistar zinjar
portfolio.description: This website was designed according to the customer’s requirements, so that the cafeteria menu is available and is arranged into sections: a drinks section, a meal section, an appetizers section, etc. This website was designed in cooperation with the cafeteria according to the requirements.

portfolio.title: Store Defacto
portfolio.description: Defacto is a leading Turkish clothing store that offers a wide variety of modern fashion for men, women and children at affordable prices. The store is distinguished by its elegant designs and diverse offers that meet all tastes and needs. DeFacto is the ideal choice for modern fashion lovers who are looking for a distinctive shopping experience at reasonable prices.

portfolio.title: CV
portfolio.description: A site A site that contains self-deprecation, who I amthat contains self-deprecation, who I am, some details about my programming skills and studies, and projects that I have completed. It summarizes my experience during the years of learning and working in programming and talks about my goals and ambitions.

portfolio.title: Bright Brush
portfolio.description: My personal website, which contains all my work in the field of design and UI/UX. On this website, I display all the work that I have accomplished for companies. This website aims to display my work to find a guest.
